BR.name: Ben 10™ Galactic Racing
BR.description: No Ben 10 Galactic Racing, o primeiro e único jogo de corridas baseado na popular série de televisão "Ben 10" da Cartoon Network, os fãs desfrutarão de uma experiência multijogador Ben 10 nunca antes vista num grande prémio galáctico recheado de surpresas a cada curva. O Ben 10 Galactic Racing conta com mais de 25 emocionantes e estimulantes pistas distribuídas por cinco gigantescos mundos do universo Ben 10. Joga como Ben, Kevin ou escolhe um dos 13 extraterrestres preferidos dos fãs e atribui-lhes um dos mais de 30 exclusivos carros. Este Outono, Ben 10 Galactic Racing apresenta a derradeira experiência de corridas, onde cada personagem tem uma capacidade especial para utilizar na pista e onde até o próprio Ben se pode transformar em vários extraterrestres a meio da corrida!

CA.name: Ben 10™ Galactic Racing
CA.description: • Fast-paced racing action set in the BEN 10 universe and based on the hit Cartoon Network TV show. • Race in over 30 different karts in 25 exhilarating and challenging grand prix tracks spread across 5 environmental worlds from the BEN 10 universe. • 15 characters for players to race as, including heroes like Ben, Kevin and 10 of Ben’s most popular alien forms. • An “Ultimate” power move unleashes a super charged, race changing boost of speed and power themed to each character’s abilities. • Drifting and mid-air stunts that both add to the excitement of the race and charge up character-specific attacks and defenses. • Single-player and Multiplayer modes include: Single Race, Grand Prix Circuit, Time Trials, Short Circuit, and Arena Showdowns (multiplayer only).

MX.name: Ben 10™ Galactic Racing
MX.description: Ben 10 Galactic Racing, el único videojuego basado en la popular serie de TV Ben 10 que se emite Cartoon Network. Conviértete en Ben o en cualquiera de sus compañeros alienígenas y compite en una trepidante carrera intergaláctica a lo largo de más de 25 divertidísimas pistas en cinco enormes mundos. Juega como Ben, Kevin o eligen entre alguno de los 13 alienígenas disponibles y ponlos al volante de más de 30 karts diferentes. Compite para conseguir los mejores tiempos en una carrera muy rápida o reta a tus amigos en modo para 4 jugadores.

US.description: • Fast-paced racing action set in the BEN 10 universe and based on the hit Cartoon Network TV show. • Race in over 30 different karts in 25 exhilarating and challenging grand prix tracks spread across 5 environmental worlds from the BEN 10 universe. • 15 characters for players to race as, including heroes like Ben, Kevin and 10 of Ben’s most popular alien forms. • An “Ultimate” power move unleashes a super charged, race changing boost of speed and power themed to each character’s abilities. • Drifting and mid-air stunts that both add to the excitement of the race and charge up character-specific attacks and defenses. • Single-player and Multiplayer modes include: Single Race, Grand Prix Circuit, Time Trials, Short Circuit, and Arena Showdowns (multiplayer only).
